summary: An ordinance relating to zoning, establishing Use, Area and Height Districts on a portion of Section 35, Township 26 North, Range 3 East, W. M., annexed to the City of Seattle under Ordinance No. 80359 on January 1, 1952, and amending Ordinance No. 45382, as amended, by adding thereto three new sections numbered 2-304, 17-247 and 10-23, respectively.
